mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, account, nickname, real_name, gender, email, mobile,password, status, avatar, country, province, city, area, street, comments, create_time, creator, update_time, operator, del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT sysUser.id AS id, sysUser.tenant_id AS tenantId, sysUser.account AS account, sysUser.nickname AS nickname, sysUser.real_name AS realName, sysUser.gender AS gender, sysUser.email AS email, sysUser.mobile AS mobile, sysUser.status AS status, sysUser.avatar AS avatar, sysUser.country AS country, sysUser.province AS province, provinceDistrict.name AS provinceName, sysUser.city AS city, cityDistrict.name AS cityName, sysUser.area AS area, sysUser.street AS street, sysUser.comments AS comments, sysUser.create_time AS createTime, sysUser.creator AS creator, sysUser.update_time AS updateTime, sysUser.operator AS operator, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sysRole.id) AS roleIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sysRole.role_key) AS roleKey, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sysRole.role_name) AS roleName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT dataPermission.organization_id) AS dataPermission, sysOrganization.id AS organizationId, sysOrganization.organization_name AS organizationName FROM t_sys_user sysUser INNER JOIN t_sys_user_role userRole ON sysUser.id = userRole.user_id AND userRole.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_sys_role sysRole ON userRole.role_id = sysRole.id AND sysRole.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_sys_district provinceDistrict ON sysUser.province = provinceDistrict.code LEFT JOIN t_sys_district cityDistrict ON sysUser.city = cityDistrict.code LEFT JOIN t_sys_data_permission_user dataPermission ON sysUser.id = dataPermission.user_id AND dataPermission.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN t_sys_organization_user organizationUser ON sysUser.id = organizationUser.user_id AND organizationUser.del_flag = 0 INNER JOIN t_sys_organization sysOrganization ON organizationUser.organization_id = sysOrganization.id AND sysOrganization.del_flag = 0 WHERE sysUser.del_flag = 0
AND sysUser.id = #{user.id}
AND sysUser.account like concat('%', #{user.account}, '%')
AND sysUser.nickname like concat('%', #{user.nickname}, '%')
AND sysUser.real_name like concat('%', #{user.realName}, '%')
AND sysUser.mobile like concat('%', #{user.mobile}, '%')
AND sysUser.email like concat('%', #{user.email}, '%')
AND sysUser.status = #{user.status}
AND sysUser.id IN (SELECT sysUser.id FROM t_sys_user sysUser INNER JOIN t_sys_user_role userRole ON sysUser.id = userRole.user_id AND userRole.del_flag = 0 AND userRole.role_id = #{user.roleId})
AND sysOrganization.id = #{user.organizationId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(sysUser.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{user.beginDateTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(sysUser.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{user.endDateTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY sysUser.id ORDER BY sysUser.create_time DESC
